common.offlineNotice: Free transcription server upgrading, currently in read-only mode

marketing.title: Read-Tube
marketing.description: Read-Tube uses AI to transform YouTube, audio, and video into structured documents. Not just transcription, but building a durable, re-readable personal digital bookshelf for you.
marketing.feature1Desc: Automatically organize long video speeches into structured, beautiful documents, allowing you to absorb dynamic visual information with the efficiency of traditional reading.
marketing.feature2Desc: Based on the latest large language models, automatically extract core perspectives, golden quotes, and mind maps from videos, accurately capturing every highlight.
marketing.feature3Desc: Whether it's a YouTube link, Podcast audio, or a local video file, Read-Tube provides a consistent, premium experience.
